snippet: An armed group abducted five local staff members of the international aid organization on a road in the province, where there have been frequent kidnappings and murders on the highways.
abstract: Red Cross says they have suspended operations in central Afghan province of Ghazni after five local staff members were kidnapped by an armed group; organization is working to secure release of its staff, and is reviewing security elsewhere in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: An armed group abducted five local staff members of the international aid organization on a road in the province, where there have been frequent kidnappings and murders on the highways.

headline.main: Afghanistan: Red Cross Halts Work in Ghazni Province After Kidnappings
headline.print_headline: Asia; Afghanistan: Red Cross Halts Work in Ghazni Province After Kidnappings

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: International Committee of the Red Cross
